definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: His writings had been translated into various languages.
sentences.chinese: 他的著作已被譯成幾種文字。

sentences.english: Ithas been translated into tens of languages, spread love to all theworld.
sentences.chinese: 被翻譯成數十種語言，將愛傳至世界各地。

sentences.english: I can promise you every word you say will be translated into English.
sentences.chinese: 我可以向你保證，你說的每個詞都會被翻譯成英語。

sentences.english: Translations in 10 languages and an album has been released.
sentences.chinese: 並且將封面翻譯成10國語言，全世界出版發行。

sentences.english: The Scriptures have never been translated into the Torgut language.
sentences.chinese: 目前尚未有翻譯成特股人語言的聖經。

sentences.english: Translated into French prose from a poem by Thomas Moore.
sentences.chinese: 散文翻譯成法文，從詩的托馬斯莫爾。

sentences.english: As far as I know, this book hasn't been translated into Chinese yet.
sentences.chinese: 就我所知，這本書還沒有被譯成中文。

sentences.english: Hao, translate this into Chinese, and then Detong post it among Yin Xin.
sentences.chinese: 浩，將其譯成中文，然後茶桶將其公佈在《印心》裏。

sentences.english: He translated an English poem into French.
sentences.chinese: 他把一首英詩譯成了法語。

sentences.english: It is said that this book has been translated into several languages.
sentences.chinese: 據說這本書已被翻譯成幾國語言。

sentences.english: Eight translations were made of it, and there were numerous paperback editions.
sentences.chinese: 它被翻譯成八種語言，出版了大量的簡裝版。

sentences.english: If you can understand, I wrote the article, please do not say it translated into Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能看懂我寫的文章，請不要講它翻譯成中文。

sentences.english: Put the following words into Chinese.
He has transcribed that book into braille.
sentences.chinese: 他已經把那本書譯成了盲文。

sentences.english: Can we really translate arhat as the 'destroyer of enemies'?
sentences.chinese: 我們能否真的將阿羅漢翻譯成“摧滅仇敵者”？
